column2: select count(*) as COUNT_ADJUST from PMDB..PM_ADJUST_TRANSACTION AD inner join PMDB..PM_ADJUST_TRANSACTION AD2 on (AD.TRANS_NO = AD2.TRANS_NO and AD.MOBILE_NO = AD2.REF_MOBILE_NO) inner join PMDB..PM_SUB_CAUSE SC on (AD.SUB_CAUSE_ID = SC.SUB_CAUSE_ID) inner join PMDB..PM_JOB_ORDER O on (AD.ADJUST_DATE = O.DATA_DATE_FR) where SC.SUB_CAUSE_CODE = (select FIELD1_VALUE from PMDB..PM_SYSTEM_ATTRIBUTE_DTL where ATTRIBUTE_CODE = 'CPAC_PARAM' and DB_VALUE = 'WRONG_NUMBER_SUB_CAUSE') and O.ORDER_ID = @order_id
